t: cityoflight.com – Be a Light. Read Books. Share Book. Give Books.
s: City of Light Publishing was founded on the idea that we can all be a light in the world.

December 3, 2024 - City Lights is an independent bookstore-publisher combination in San Francisco, California, that specializes in world literature, the arts, and progressive politics. It also houses the nonprofit City Lights Foundation, which publishes selected titles related to San Francisco culture.

t: Review of City Lights Bookstore | San Francisco, California, North America - AFAR
s: November 22, 2022 - In an age when many independent ... and Amazon, City Lights is a true survivor. Since it was founded by poet Lawrence Ferlinghetti in 1956, it has served as a gathering place for San Francisco’s literary communities. Everyone from beat poets to left-wing critics of America have found a welcome here. City Lights is also a publishing house, with ...

s: Specialties: Check out our website at citylights.com! City Lights Bookstore offers three floors of new-release hardcovers and quality paperbacks from all of the major publishing houses, along with an impressive range of titles from smaller, harder-to-find, specialty publishers.
